attributes.action: Stop selling fireworks to the public.
attributes.additional_details:
So many animals suffer at this time of year.
Vets have to stock up and prescribe medications.
Some owners have to put their dogs in kennels away from the noise.
My dog is safe and indoors and petrified - how bad must it be for wild and outdoor animals.
Also safety concerns for animals and humans.
So upset.
attributes.background:
My poor dog has had 5 nights of terror. Its only Oct 24th & already 5 nights she has spent shaking and upset.
Shes on tablets from the vets, many of my friends have pets who suffer too.
We have had 5 lots of fireworks tonight .
Please stop selling them to the public
